titles.title: 408 Jesus Only Is Our Message (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 c1 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus only
Is our message
Jesus all
Our theme shall be
We will lift up
Jesus ever
Jesus only will we see

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus only - Jesus ever
Jesus all in all we sing
Savior Sanctifier and Healer
Glorious Lord
And coming King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus only is our Savior
All our guilt
He bore away
All our righteousness
He gives us
All our strength
From day to day

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is our Sanctifier
Saving us from
Self and sin
And with all
His Spirit's fullness
Filling all our
Hearts within

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus only is our Healer
All our sicknesses
He bare
And His risen
Life and fullness
All His members
Still may share

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus only is our Power
He the gift
Of Pentecost
Jesus breathe
Thy pow'r upon us
Fill us with
The Holy Ghost

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And for Jesus
We are waiting
List'ning for the
Advent Call
But 'twill still be
Jesus only
Jesus ever all in all
